name: react-express-starter
description: Full stack webapp starter with 0 frotnend vulnerabilities as of August 2021. React/Redux/Express/Sequelize

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend && mv ./frontend/build ./build/app && mv ./backend/build/index.js ./build && rm -rf ./backend && rm -rf ./frontend
scripts.install: npm --prefix backend install backend && npm --prefix frontend install frontend && npm --prefix build install build
